translations: v．仔细考虑，慎重思考：认真地思考某个问题或决定。
· The jury deliberates before reaching a verdict.
陪审团在做出裁决前会仔细考虑。

sentences.sentence: Every time any official in Beijing deliberates publicly about seeking an alternative to the U.S. dollar for the $2.1 trillion China holds in reserve, currency traders have a heart attack.
sentences.translation: 每当北京的任何官员公开商议，为中国持有的2.1万亿美元外汇储备寻找替代美元的货币时，外汇交易员就会心脏病发作。

sentences.sentence: Therefore own look up, deliberates is very good.
sentences.translation: 所以自己多查，多推敲是很好的。

sentences.sentence: A few other Republicans have said they will vote for her when the full Senate deliberates.
sentences.translation: 另几个共和党人也表示将在参院全会就此投票时予其支持。
